metadata.title: CVE-2024-38796 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2 contains a vulnerability in the PeCoffLoaderRelocateImage(). AnAttacker may cause memory corruption due to an overflow via an adjacentnetwork. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss ofConfidentiality, Integrity, and/or Availability.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
